attributes.action: Ensure that anti-Zionism is treated in the same manner as Anti-Semitism when used as a cover for Anti-Semitism
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Anti-Zionism, though not necessarily anti-Semitic, is often used as a cover for anti-Semitism. The difference and similarity between the two is worthy of a government and public debate.
However, the circumstances in which anti-Zionism is clearly used as a cover for anti-Semitism should be defined in legislation and prosecutable in the same manner as other forms of racism.
